Title: Embellished Illusion Evening Dress with Train

Featured-image: 8730-deep-coral-embellished-illusion-evening-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: This beautiful floor length gown is perfect for proms or brides maids. It has a chiffon skirt that reaches the floor and a beaded bodice that accents the shoulders with a  sheer overlay. The cap sleeves and intricate design of the beading on the back finish this dress with a whimsical elegance.
